column2: By gathering enough of the Folketro lands under your rule, you can unite the faithful under a great high priest, the Allsherjargode.
If powerful enough, a Ny Sed ruler may have the possibility to claim the religion for himself and bring the Ny Sed faith to a new era...
You have the possibility to change your religious branch once in a lifetime
column3: Vous avez la possibilité de changer de branche religieuse une fois dans votre vie
column4: Sie haben die Möglichkeit ihren Zweig ein mal ins Leben zu ändern
column5: Tienes la posibilidad de cambiar de rama religiosa una vez en la vida

column2: As a member of the [lamb_cult.GetName], you have begun a dive into the legends of the Saints, uncovering a strange familiarity of these tales with the Christians of the South, perhaps you have more in common then you think...
Christ was a great shepard as much as he was a warrior...

As a member of the [hiddenfolk_cult.GetName], you have begun a dive into the legends of the Huntsmen, uncovering a strange familiarity of these tales with tales of other great and legendary warriors among the Stories of Other People...
Was the Huntsmen the only great one on the battlefield of Ragnarok?

Ever since Ragnarok struck down the Old World, the Folketro faith has been but a scattered tapestry of local cults and practices. However, [d_folketro.Holder.GetBestName] has managed to secure key religious positions throughout Scandinavia and many of the greatest priests, skalds and lords have accepted the guiding wisdom of the newly created Allsherjargode. A priest of priests, the Allsherjargode and [d_folketro.Holder.GetHerHis] wise council who will be the final religious authority of all Folketro.
Choose the ancestors you wish to venerate!

The Folketro Faith has many figures that are worshipped to varying degrees by its most ardent believers. From the mysteries of the Hidden Folk to the reverance of the holy Apostles, your personal devotion to these spirits are paramount to being a devout Folketro adherence.
In the spirit of God Almighty I shall heed the word of his Holy Apostles!
Perhaps, I should look into [folketro.GetHighGodName] as to guard against Ragnarok...
A legendary sorceror-queen of old whose sons would go on to found mighty kingdoms. Many of  the noble clans of Scandinavia therefore claim descent from her.
The first Neuhumanist king of Denmark who for a time broke the hegemony of the Lutheran lords there.
